archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Manage Data Quality
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Mange data quality process provides capabilities to Monitor Data Quality, Perform Data Quality Audit and Manage Audit Report.

properties.value: Manage data quality process ensures that the data maintained within the enterprise meets the required quality standards for use by other processes within and outside the organization. It provides capabilities to continuously monitor the data quality, perform data quality audits as per audit reports and also manage the report generated by audit process.
